titleStmt.title: John Boyle to E. A. Starling
CWG13856

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.collection: Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 3 ; 9 April - 25 May 1864

body.p:
375
May 17 4
Col E. A. Starling
Hopkinsville, Ky
Col.

I have the honor per direction of the Governor to enclose herein copy of extract of Inspectors Report of Dist of Ky for March 1864 -- Your attention is called to that portion relative to your command.

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl of Ky
